extension.name: Image Index Preview
extension.description: Displays a small image preview for upload fields on publish index and publish edit pages.

releases.release: - Compatibility with Symphony 2.3.3 - Thumbnail size is now proportional to the image dimensions
- Compatibility with Symphony 2.3 - Displays preview for first column on publish index in Symphony 2.3.1 (previously not possible) - Delegates ownership to Symphony Community
- Added preview to the edit pages
- Support for other upload fields beside the default one
